rathmalana aadarsha nagaraye dharma paryeshanalaye adhyaksha panadura wijaya saugatha widyalaya piriwene aacharya hagoda wipassi himiyan me sanlapayen awadharanaya karanne siyalu janaya ekase piligath bauddha darshanaya padanam karagath deshiya chinthanaya thawaduratath aaraksha karagatha yuthu bawath, eya khandanaya wana ayuru manawa handunagena ewani upakrama walakwa gatha yuthu bawath ya.
liyanna koyi tharam dewal hithata aawath, eekata hari welawak na.
